name: Code Flask Back End Keys Env Agent
shortDescription: Integrates environment variables into the Flask backend.
fullDescription: This agent is responsible for integrating essential environment variables into the Flask backend application. It creates or updates the Keys/keys.env file with the necessary environment configurations required for secure and smooth operation of the app.
UseCases:
1. Securely manage sensitive environment variables.
2. Automate the creation of .env configurations for Flask projects.
3. Centralize environment setup for consistent backend deployments.
